item.title: Predetermined
item.description: You own your life.

item.title: Next
item.description: The more we want to live, the less we are willing to fight. For death. It’s a great topic over there, lots of mature people advice young generations to think about that word several times. It does boost our life performance.

item.title: FAKEHAPPY
item.description: There’s a singer that sings this song and you better listen to it.

item.title: Death
item.description: Us, facing death every day. Even in our most brightest moment, it won’t leave us. Having endured with some depression and receive some supporation from friends, I have realized that there’s three session to confront with it.

item.title: What should I do
item.description: Highly recommend you watch an anime and revisit this post.

item.title: Write for yourself
item.description: I have doubted myself for a long time, about the purpose of my writing. Is it for the readers or solely self entertainment? I write helplessly, for the sake of leisure.

item.title: The Battle Is Over
item.description: How’s the feeling when you keep insisting on things that seem impossible to achieve? That’s how I feel currently. There’s a show near my house which plays the music quite loud from mid of the day until late at night. It makes me frustrated since I can’t focus on learning. Conversely, I keep sitting at the table with the hope that I will concentrate more on absorbing the knowledge, when my headphones don’t have the block noise function.

item.title: Midnight
item.description: If you’re happy or currently experience some possitive moment, than you should skip this post. Mostly, it’s about me facing with myself and uncertainty I have with my own future.

item.title: Mindful
item.description: Carefully saying things and avoid hurting people if possible, showing respect to them (a bit exaggeration here).

item.title: Let me tell yah
item.description: Let me tell you what has just happened. I have criticized myself badly previously due to some of my random activities. I wonder why I did it, or at least some clues that drives my actions. But really, I don’t have the exact answer for it. I keep blaming the fault behind all of my failures is because of external conditions, and wasn’t my decisions.

item.title: Extra vs. Intro
item.description: Is it neccessary to know whether you’re an extravert or introvert?

item.title: Up
item.description:
It’s hard when asking the question How?

When things get even more tough, we tend to avoid facing them. Start complaining about life. For both of us, it’s the thing we usually do.

item.title: In the end
item.description: I’m still in the process of facing the results of what I did previously. I know. It seems a long time when everyday, keep exposing to it isn’t the good thing att all.

item.title: Know who you are
item.description: Nowadays, life move faster. Without time for yourself, you’ll easily affected by that speedy mood.

item.title: It's inside
item.description: Having been through a next darkness moment. Feel like I was missing out on something essential in my personalities. Anger, anxiety, sad, happy, all that emotion happens through plenty of events. Am I lying? Maybe.

item.title: Really is
item.description: Sometimes things go beyond our control. It’s just not that easy to keep a positive mindset during this period. Clueless and even a way to strive through, need more motivation.

item.title: Prepare isn't the case
item.description: Can’t denying the fact that ordering play a vital role in our life. It saves our life in the aspect of dedication. Which dedicated to the thing we actually fall in love with.

item.title: Speak less
item.description:
There’s always light in the darkness.

I always say “show them your empathy” as saying more than needed in every conversation. Including those people who are impatient when hearing. I was wrong.

item.title: Accept the imperfection
item.description: Starting to realize when we keep moving on and leave behind the perfectness of the result, we have more time for other activities. Spend too many time and focus on the quality may exhaust our ability to solve other problems on the daily basis.

item.title: Acceptance
item.description: A week already past, I encountered some issues and problems. I would say it one of the most darkness moments in my life. It can be bad or good, still play a vital role in giving me the lesson. Hereâ€™s what I learned.

item.title: The Opening Section
item.description: Having been thinking about making this stuff, I finally did it after a long time’s digging around with Website and domains.
